_sText:
Made this map because there was someone named justa on GMod bhop with the biggest ego ever. He thought he was the best coder and had the best smoothest gmod bhop server there is put people down that were not in there group, Cat - Vehnex ect. Video here to see what these kids are about. 

 

He had a server called justas cool server with a fake coded RNGFix that he tried to hide from everyone by making his server whitelisted. I made his map after him it Requires CS:S/GMod RNGFix uphill fixes :) that I finally got from a very nice GMod Russian dev named CLazStudio. So happy I finally found some real nice people to play with and not this toxic shit junk loser bullshit. This was not a normal act I had pizza, boxes and stuff send to my house they DDoSed me and made fun of me... enjoy the map! Oh and justa took about 1500 USD dollars from me from tricking me in a fake biding scam with henwi. These kids are sick and need help they only care about cheating records and being assholes. Maps about 13 secs long on CS:S and 11 secs on GMod.
